name: EditCaptureTime

methods.name: setToCorrectedTime

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date to be set for the selected files.
parameters.longdesc: Valid values for date are from 1 to 31, depending upon the month and the year.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: Month to be set for the selected files.
parameters.longdesc: Valid values for month are from 1 to 12.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Year to be set for the selected files.

parameters.name: hour
parameters.description: Hour to be set for the selected files.
parameters.longdesc: Valid values for hour are from 1 to 24.

parameters.name: minute
parameters.description: Minute to be set for the selected files.
parameters.longdesc: Valid values for minute are from 1 to 60.

parameters.name: second
parameters.description: Second to be set for the selected files.
parameters.longdesc: Valid values for second are from 1 to 60.

methods.description: Sets the capture time of all files to a specified time.
methods.longdesc: Returns true or false according to the operation completion status

methods.name: shiftBySetTime

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signifies whether you want to add or subtract the set time.
parameters.longdesc: Valid values for sign are + or - .

parameters.name: Shiftedhour
parameters.description: Shifts the capture time of the selected files by a specified number of hours.
parameters.longdesc: Valid values for hour are from 1 to 24.

parameters.name: ShiftedMinute
parameters.description: Shifts the capture time of the selected files by a specified number of minutes.
parameters.longdesc: Valid values for minute are from 1 to 60.

parameters.name: ShiftedSecond
parameters.description: Shifts the capture time of the selected files by a specified number of seconds.
parameters.longdesc: Valid values for second are from 1 to 60.

methods.description: Shift capture time by set time.
methods.longdesc: Shifts the capture time of all the selected files by the set amount of hours, minutes or seconds.

methods.name: revertToOriginalTime
methods.description: Reverts the capture time of all selected files to the original capture time.

description: Provides ways to edit the capture time of .jpeg and .raw files.
longdesc: Adobe Bridge lets you edit the capture time of JPEG and CameraRaw files. You can edit or update the capture time of the selected file to a specific time, shift the capture time by a specified duration, or revert the updated capture time.
